column3: ɔsor nkan no ɔkɔm a Abraham n'aber do no osii no. Na Isaak kɔr Filistiafo hɔn hen Abimelek nkyɛn wɔ Gerar."
na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Mma nnkɔ Egypt; tsena asaase a mebɛkyerɛ wo no do."

column3: na menye wo bɛtsena
column4: na mehyira wo; na ɔwo
column6: na medze asaase yi nyinara mebɛma hom
column7: na mebɛma ntam a mekaa kyerɛɛ w'egya Abraham no etsim;"

column2: "na mebɛma w'asefo adɔr dɛ ɔsor nworaba
column3: na medze asaase yi nyinara ama w'asefo; na w'asefo mu na wobehyira asaase do aman nyinara

column2: "Na hɔ mba no bisaa no wɔ ne yer ho; na ɔsee dɛ
column3: M'akyerɛbaa a: osiandɛ osuroo dɛ ɔbɛse dɛ
column4: Me yer a; na ɔsee dɛ
column5: bɛyɛ na osian Rebeka ntsi hɔ mba no eku me: osiandɛ no ho yɛ fɛw."

column3: aber a ɔkyɛɛr hɔ no
column4: Filistiafo hen Abimelek hwɛɛ tokura mu
column5: na ohun dɛ Isaak nye ne yer Rebeka rowewe."

column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hwɛ
column5: ampaara wo yer a: na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ekaa dɛ
column6: ɔyɛ m'akyerɛbaa yi? Na Isaak see no dɛ
column8: Bɛyɛ na mewu wɔ ne ntsi."

column3: Ebɛnadze na ayɛ hɛn yi? Nkyɛ erebɛyɛ ma nkorɔfo yi mu bi nye wo yer ada
column4: ma edze afɔdzi aba hɛn do."

column3: dɛ
column4: Nyia ɔbɛtsen ne nsa aka banyin yi anaa ne yer no ampaara dɛ woboku no."

column2: "Na Isaak duaa aba wɔ asaase no do
column3: no onyaa ɔha mbɔho wɔ afe no ara mu: osiandɛ EWURADZE hyiraa no."
na onyaa no ho araa kodur dɛ ɔyɛɛ kɛsenara:"
anantwikuw
column4: fifo kɛsenara: na Filistiafo hɔn enyi beer no."

column2: "Afei mbura a n'egya Abraham n'aber do no n'egya no nkowaa tutui no nyinara Filistiafo no sisiiw no
column3: na wɔdze dɛtse hyehyɛɛ mu amaama."
Fi hɛn nkyɛn kɔ; na ɔwo ewɔ tum dodow sen hɛn."
na ɔkɔbɔɔ asese wɔ Gerar bɔnsa mu
column4: na ɔtsenaa hɔ."

column2: "Na Isaak tutuu mbura a n'egya aber do no wotutui no fofor; osiandɛ Abraham wui n'ekyir no Filistiafo no sisiiw no: na ɔfrɛfrɛɛ hɔn edzin dɛ mbrɛ n'egya dze frɛfrɛɛ hɔn no ara."
"Na Isaak no nkowaa tuu bɔnsa no mu
column3: na wɔkɔtoo mbasu bura wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na Gerar mbowahwɛfo wɔnye Isaak no mbowahwɛfo perperee
column3: dɛ
column4: Nsu no hɛndze a: na ɔfrɛɛ bura no ne dzin Esek; osiandɛ wɔnye no perperee."

column3: na wɔperpeer ɔno so ho; na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Sitna."
na okotuu bura fofor; na ɔnodze wɔammperper ho: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Rehobot
column4: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: na afei EWURADZE ama hɛn bea
column6: na yɛbɔwowo wɔ asaase yi do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE yii noho kyerɛɛ no anafua no ara
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Emi nye w'egya Abraham ne Nyankopɔn: mma nnsuro
column7: na osian m'akowaa Abraham ntsi mebɛma w'asefo adɔr."

column3: na ɔsɔɔr EWURADZE
column4: na ɔbɔɔ n'asesee wɔ hɔ: na hɔ na Isaak no nkowaa tuu bura."

column3: nye ne safohen tsitsir Fikol
column4: fi Gerar kɔr ne nkyɛn."

column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom aba mo hɔ yi
column4: hwɛ dɛ hom tan me
column5: na hom eyi me edzi wɔ hom nkyɛn?"

column3: Yeehu no kotoo dɛ
column4: EWURADZE nye wo nam: na yɛsee dɛ
column6: mekyerɛ hɛn nye ɔwo ntamu a
column7: na ma yɛnye wo ndzi ahyɛmu;"

column3: osiandɛ yɛanntsen hɛn nsa annka wo
column4: na yɛnnyɛ wo hwee dɛ papa nko
column5: na yeegya wo kwan wɔ asomdwee mu: osiandɛ ɔwo nye nyia EWURADZE ehyira no."

column3: ma wodzidzii na wɔnomee."
na wodzii nsew kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔnho: na Isaak gyaa hɔn kwan
column4: na wɔdze asomdwee fii ne nkyɛn kɔree."

column3: na Isaak no nkowaa bae
column4: na wɔbɛkaa no bura a wotui no ho asɛm

column2: "Na ɔfrɛɛ no Siba: dɛm ntsi kurow no ne dzin dze Beer-seba ɔdze bodu ndɛ da yi."
"Na aber a Esau dzii mfe eduanan no
column3: ɔwaar Hetnyi Beeri ne babaa Judit
column4: nye Hetnyi Elon ne babaa Basemat:"

column2: "na wɔyɛɛ ma Isaak nye Rebeka dzi awerɛhow."
